name: VELA Handknit Banana Yarn Snood with Leather Strap - PLAIN CABLE
description: Textured handknitted snood with detachable leather press stud strap. Handknitted from 100% natural banana fibre yarn that is produced sustainably from the pruned excess outer layers of the Banana tree after each fruit harvest in South Nepal. Detachable leather strap can also be worn as a wrist band, and is made from Buffalo leather with natural matt finish. Dimensions: Height: 40cm, Top width 50cm loop, Base width 80cm loop Available in: (1) Black Banana Yarn Knit with Black Leather Strap (2) Cream Banana Yarn Knit with Brown Leather Strap - out of stock (3) Brown Banana Yarn Knit with Brown Leather Strap (4) Dark Grey Banana Yarn Knit with Black Leather Strap (5) Slate Blue Banana Yarn Knit with Brown Leather Strap This product is also available in THICK STRIPE and THIN STRIPE - Please see other listings. Free delivery for all orders within the UK. For EU countries, delivery is £10 per order. Customers in Belgium and Netherlands, please visit More Than Hip. name: ESTA Satchel
description: The ESTA Satchel is made from good quality buffalo leather, with central decorative stitch detail, leather handles and straps. It is lined with black cotton and outer zip pocket on the back body, front body as well as zip pocket inside the lining. Shoulder strap has an adjustable brass buckle and the front flap closes with strong magnetic clasps. Also available in the patchwork design where the front flap only is covered with a mix of black/grey/brown diamond shaped leather patchwork. AURA QUE works with soft Buffalo leather that is produced in South Nepal as a by-product of the Nepalese food industry. The lining is woven on hand-looms in Kathmandu. Each AURA QUE design is brought to life in a Nepalese factory that employs local people, some affected by disabilities, providing an income for themselves and their families according to fair trade principles. AURA QUE products are individually hand crafted in Nepal, which may result in slight variations. The unique story behind each AURA QUE product enhances its charm! Dimensions: H28cm W23cm D8cm With adjustable long strap length: 120cm Available in: > Grey Patchwork Leather > Black Patchwork Leather Free delivery for all orders within the UK. For EU countries, delivery is £10 per order. Customers in Belgium and Netherlands, please visit More Than Hip. For the rest of the world, delivery is £15 per order. Delivery charges are per order, not by number of items purchased. **Please note that the model shoot is to show scale of the product style, though may be a different colour/type**

name: ALINA Tote
description: The ALINA Tote has a 40cm zip closure hidden inside the main body, with double handles length 60cm, so it easily fits over your shoulder. A structured bag, with an outside zip pocket on the front body and a reinforced base. AURA QUE works with soft Buffalo leather that is produced in South Nepal as a by-product of the Nepalese food industry. The lining is woven on hand-looms in Kathmandu. ALINA is in all leather with patchwork design on the front body panel, and plain leather on the back body. ALINA is also available in jacquard/leather - please see other listing. name: Jogi Shopper in Plain or Striped Cotton
description: This slouchy shopper is a great casual bag for all occasions. With a roomy interior it can hold all your everyday items, and has a large inside zip pocket in the centre panel, with two large internal compartments, which can be tied closed with a string tie. Handles are wide and long enough to comfortable sit on the shoulder, incorporating the ‘jogi’ twisted handles seen in previous seasons. There is also a loop tie attached to the handle for your keys or the Jogi Zip Purse to be attached (included with the Jogi Shopper). All AURA QUE fabric products are made from woven cotton fabrics, hand-woven in Bhaktapur, East of Kathmandu and dyed with azo-free dyes. For this Jogi bag, we have used a slightly thicker and more durable heavy cotton drill, (similar weight to a denim) which really suits this style. Each AURA QUE design is brought to life in a Nepalese factory that employs local people, some affected by disabilities, providing an income for themselves and their families according to fair trade principles. AURA QUE products are individually hand crafted in Nepal, which may result in slight variations. The unique story behind each AURA QUE product enhances its charm! Dimensions: H 35cm W 35cm D 22cm – handle drop 40cm Available in heavy cotton drill: > Royal Blue > Coral Red > Light Brown > Grey Stripe > Black Stripe > Lt Brown Stripe > Dk Brown Stripe > Dark Grey - out of stock > Mint Blue - out of stock > Light Grey - out of stock > Blue Stripe - out of stock Also available in Geometric & Aztec Jacquard - See other listing. Free delivery for all orders within the UK. For EU countries, delivery is £10 per order. Customers in Belgium and Netherlands, please visit More Than Hip. name: Pop up Tree Christmas Card
description:
Christmas card made in Nepal from sustainable Lokta paper.  Pop up card that can be displayed at Christmas...

The card and envelope are made from a traditional handmade textured Nepalese paper produced by traditional methods sustainably from the Lokta tree outer bark.

Message can be written on the back of card, with the tree scenery displayed at the front.
There is a printed description (about how the Lokta paper is made in Nepal) on the back of each card:"Made from handmade Lokta Paper which is produced by traditional techniques and printing processes in Nepal.Only the outer Lokta Bark is collected in the Himalaya region to ensure the preservation of the trees."

A6 Size Card - available as a pack of 1 or pack of 4 cards with natural paper envelopes.

Each AURA QUE design is brought to life in Nepal by local people, some affected by disabilities, providing an income for themselves and their families according to fair trade principles.

name: Large MANCHU Bag in Leather
description: The Large MANCHU Bag is a classic style with antique brass zip closure and flat rectangular shape. The handles fit comfortably on your shoulder and there is a long detachable and adjustable strap to wear the bag across the body. The AURA QUE handmade brass logo plate is riveted and stitched to the centre panel on the front body. There is a small zip pocket on the back body as well as the inside lining, and the main compartment of the bag closes fully with a antique brass zip for security. AURA QUE works with soft Buffalo leather that is produced in South Nepal as a by-product of the Nepalese food industry. The lining is woven on hand-looms in Kathmandu. Dimensions: W33xH38cm Detachable strap: 120cm adjustable. Available in: > Grey Leather Each AURA QUE design is brought to life in a Nepalese factory that employs local people, some affected by disabilities, providing an income for themselves and their families according to fair trade principles. AURA QUE products are individually hand crafted in Nepal, which may result in slight variations. The unique story behind each AURA QUE product enhances its charm! Free delivery for all orders within the UK. For EU countries, delivery is £10 per order. Customers in Belgium and Netherlands, please visit More Than Hip. For the rest of the world, delivery is £15 per order. Delivery charges are per order, not by number of items purchased.

name: DANI Small Handbag
description: The DANI handbag has short hand-held handles with woven leather detail, best worn across the body with the detachable and adjustable across-body strap for the most active wearers! A great compact bag, but surprisingly sturdy and roomy for all occasions. As with the AURA QUE classic leather bag range, DANI also has plenty of compartments including the rectangular zip pocket on the front body, pocket on the back body and an inside zip pocket in the lining, for all your valuables. Antique brass base studs protect the reinforced base panel, and the d-ring tabs on either side, allow the bag to be pulled in or loosened depending on bag contents. AURA QUE works with soft Buffalo leather that is produced in South Nepal as a by-product of the Nepalese food industry. The lining is woven on hand-looms in Kathmandu. Available in All Leather or Leather with Banana Yarn Handknitted Panels. For the DANI Handbag with handknit Banana Yarn - these pieces have strong side panels hand-knitted from strong 100% natural banana yarn fibre that is produced sustainably from the pruned excess outer layers of the Banana tree after each fruit harvest in South Nepal. Bags are fully lined. Dimensions: H23cm W32cm D11cm Long Strap Length: 70 – 100cm adjustable length Available in: > Black Leather/Banana Yarn > Brown Leather/Banana Yarn > Grey All Leather > Grey Leather/Banana Yarn - out of stock > Black All Leather - out of stock > Brown All Leather - out of stock Each AURA QUE design is brought to life in a Nepalese factory that employs local people, some affected by disabilities, providing an income for themselves and their families according to fair trade principles. AURA QUE products are individually hand crafted in Nepal, which may result in slight variations. The unique story behind each AURA QUE product enhances its charm! Free delivery for all orders within the UK. For EU countries, delivery is £10 per order. Customers in Belgium and Netherlands, please visit More Than Hip. For the rest of the world, delivery is £15 per order. Delivery charges are per order, not by number of items purchased.

name: TARA Hobo
description: The TARA handbag has a comfortable strap with hand-woven leather detail to be thrown on your shoulder, giving it the slouchy practical hobo shape, with easy access to the main zip opening of the bag. As with the AURA QUE classic leather bag range, TARA also has plenty of compartments including the rectangular zip pocket on the front body, pocket on the back body and an inside zip pocket in the lining, for all your valuables. Antique brass base studs protect the reinforced base panel, and the d-ring tabs on either side, allow the bag to be pulled in or loosened depending on bag contents. AURA QUE works with soft Buffalo leather that is produced in South Nepal as a by-product of the Nepalese food industry. The lining is woven on hand-looms in Kathmandu. Available in All Leather or Leather with Banana Yarn Handknitted Panels. For the TARA Hobo with handknit Banana Yarn - these pieces have strong side panels hand-knitted from strong 100% natural banana yarn fibre that is produced sustainably from the pruned excess outer layers of the Banana tree after each fruit harvest in South Nepal. name: LILA Large Handbag
description: The LILA handbag has long handles with hand-woven leather detail, best worn comfortably slung on your shoulder. Though there is also a detachable and adjustable across-body strap for those necessary 'hands-free' moments! As well as the roomy interior secure with antique brass zip closure, LILA has plenty of compartments including the rectangular zip pocket on the front body, pocket on the back body with magnetic clasp closure and an inside zip pocket in the lining, for all your valuables! Antique brass base studs protect the reinforced base panel, and the d-ring tabs on either side, allow the bag to be pulled in or loosened depending on bag contents. AURA QUE works with soft Buffalo leather that is produced in South Nepal as a by-product of the Nepalese food industry and the lining is woven on hand-looms in Kathmandu. Available in All Leather or Leather with Banana Yarn Handknitted Panels. For the LILA Handbag with handknit Banana Yarn - these pieces have strong side panels hand-knitted from strong 100% natural banana yarn fibre that is produced sustainably from the pruned excess outer layers of the Banana tree after each fruit harvest in South Nepal. Bags are fully lined. name: SUNDA Shoulder Bag
description: The SUNDA Shoulder Bag has braided leather strap that can be worn on the shoulder or across the body. Great for being on the move! As with the AURA QUE classic leather bag range, SUNDA has a zip closure, with leather zip pull and inside zip pocket in the lining, for all your valuables. AURA QUE works with soft Buffalo leather that is produced in South Nepal as a by-product of the Nepalese food industry. The lining is woven on hand-looms in Kathmandu. The knitted body of the bag is hand-knitted from strong 100% natural banana yarn fibre that is produced sustainably from the pruned excess outer layers of the Banana tree after each fruit harvest in South Nepal. Bags are fully lined.
